channel.title: part 2 on Jonathan Piedra
channel.description: Recent content in part 2 on Jonathan Piedra

item.title: Scripted S3 Site Deployment with AWS CLI and Powershell, Part 2
item.description: In this final post for a two-part series, we’ll go over an additional script that can be used to upload all local static site contents to a previously configured Amazon Web Services S3 bucket.

item.title: JavaScript Design Patterns: Module
item.description: In the second installation of this series on JavaScript design patterns and their implementation, we take a look at the module pattern. By combining two commonly used features in the language, we can create robust interfaces that hide member variables and methods as we see fit.
